subject: OFFICE OF PRESIDENTIAL JUDIC
body:
OFFICE OF PRESIDENTIAL JUDICIAL COMMITTEE ON UNCLAIMED PAYMENT
Address: 9C33+X2W, Rue 390,Abuja Republic of Nigeria.
RE- INVESTIGATION ON TRANSACTION DELAY/FINAL PAYMENT OF YOUR $5.9MILLION UNCLAIMED  FUND TO YOU.
 Attention Dear Beneficiary,
 
  It is well as my office want to bring this good tidings to you that following the last meeting of the Presidents and leaders of West Africa countries that is known as the Ecowas Countries of which President Armed Tinubu of Nigeria is the current Chairman) held two Week ago in Ghana in which there was a consensus decision to review all the pending transactions  and see to its immediate payment.
In line with the outcome, the meeting of my office as the Judicial committee payment head has decided to contact you and other Fifteen other beneficiaries for this special payment.
It is so important for you to bear in mind that your $5.9Million payment is in line with the World Bank  long overdue office directorate Unit in  Swaziland who felt that you are being cheated for not paying you your outstanding payment which has been long overdue for years.
For a proper verification and documentation of your payment file you are to fill/ send to us the below:
1--------------------- YOUR NAMES IN FULL
2-------------------- YOUR COUNTRY/STATES /ADDRESS
3-------------------- YOUR GOING PHONE NUMBER
4---------------------- YOUR CURRENT OCCUPATION
5---------------------- YOUR AGE/MARITAL STATUS
 
My Office will expect to hear from you soonest with prompt action in sending the above detailed of yours,
With regards,
 Justice Lateef Fagbemi
  Attorney General of the federation
/Head of Committee on unclaimed Fund payment

subject: Re:   OFFICE OF PRESIDENTIAL JUDIC
body:
Dear Justice Lateef Fagbemi,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the unclaimed payment. I appreciate the information you have provided and I am interested in learning more about this opportunity. 

Could you please clarify how my payment became overdue? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the situation before proceeding. 

Also, could you explain what role the World Bank's long overdue office Unit in Swaziland plays in this process? How did they determine that I have been cheated?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Shellie

subject: Dear Shellie (copy of MINISTER of Justice OPERATIONAL Id)
body:
[image: image.png]



*OFFICE OF PRESIDENTIAL COMMITTEE ON UNCLAIMED PAYMENT*


*Address: 9C33+X2W, Rue 390,Abuja Republic of Nigeria.*


*RE- INVESTIGATION ON TRANSACTION DELAY/FINAL PAYMENT OF YOUR $44.3MILLION
TO YOU.*


*Hello Dear Beneficiary **, *

*Thanks for your candid response  and updates which I am lately replying
back to today Friday.*

* How are you doing,I'm with the hope that you and your families are wellOK
if so doxology,*

* However, it is so painful that you have wrongly in the past fallen in to
the hands to bad government officials who for no reason or the other failed
to comply to the directive to have your fund then paid to you, but by the
reason of this new appointment to me by the new government that is board
this abnormalities will now be corrected. *

*However, the directive from the World Bank compensation unit in
Switzerland working in conjunction with the office has deemed you fit to be
compensated for delays that you have witnessed in having your long awaited
fund paid to you.*

*As a matter of fact,I assure you of using good office in seeing this time
around that the $44.3Million allocated to will be duly paid to by the
paying bank which I have forwarded your name today. *

 *Meanwhile, your file has been forwarded today Friday to (THE FIRST BANK
NIGERIA PLC) and all you have to do is to follow up with them and keep my
office updated for follow up onyourbehalf.*

*  the copy of the working id to you for you to know who you are dealing
with.*

*For a proper verification and documentation of your payment file you are
to fill/ send to us the below:*

*1--------------------- YOUR NAMES IN FULL*
*2-------------------- YOUR COUNTRY/ADDRESS*
*3-------------------- YOUR GOING PHONE NUMBER*
*4---------------------- YOUR CURRENT OCCUPATION*
*5---------------------- YOUR AGE/MARITAL STATUS*
*6----------------------- NAME OF NEXT OF KIN*



*My Office will expect to hear from you soonest with prompt action in
sending the above detailed of yours,*



*With regards,*


 Justice *Lateef Fagbemi*
*  Attorney General of the federation*
*/Head of Committee on unclaimed Fund payment  *

_______
  Dear Justice Lateef Fagbemi,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the unclaimed payment. I
appreciate the information you have provided and I am interested in
learning more about this opportunity.

Could you please clarify how my payment became overdue? I want to make sure
I have a clear understanding of the situation before proceeding.

Also, could you explain what role the World Bank's long overdue office Unit
in Swaziland plays in this process? How did they determine that I have been
cheated?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.
Best wishes,
Shellie

subject: Re: Dear Shellie (copy of MINISTER of Justice OPERATIONAL Id)
body:
Dear Shellie,

Thank you for your response and interest in resolving the issue of your unclaimed payment. I understand your concern about how the payment became overdue, and I apologize for any inconvenience caused.

The delay in your payment was due to the actions of previous government officials who failed to comply with the directive to release your funds. However, with the new government in place, they have recognized this issue and are working towards rectifying it.

The World Bank unit has been involved in this process to ensure transparency and fairness. They have reviewed your case and deemed you eligible for the payment that has been long awaited. Their role is to oversee the proper disbursement of funds and prevent any further delays or mishandling.

To proceed with the payment, I kindly request you to provide me with some necessary information. This includes your full name, country address, phone number, current occupation, age, marital status, and the name of your next of kin. Once I receive these details, I will forward them to THE FIRST BANK NIGERIA PLC for further processing.

Please be assured that my office is committed to ensuring a smooth and successful resolution to this matter. Feel free to ask any additional questions or concerns you may have.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shellie

subject: Re: Hello: Dear Beneficiary Shellie (MY HELP) waiting updates
body:
Dear Shellie,

Thank you for your response and interest in resolving the issue of your unclaimed payment. I understand your concern about how the payment became overdue, and I apologize for any inconvenience caused by the previous government officials.

The World Bank unit in Swaziland is working in collaboration with our office to rectify the delays and ensure that your long-awaited funds are paid to you. They have deemed you fit to receive the payment and have provided us with their directive to proceed.

To further assist you, we have forwarded your file to THE FIRST BANK NIGERIA PLC. You will need to follow up with them directly regarding the payment process. Please keep my office updated on any progress or developments.

In order for us to properly update your payment file, we kindly request that you provide us with the following details:
- Your full name
- Your country address
- Your phone number
- Your current occupation
- Your age and marital status
- The name of your next of kin

Once we receive this information, we can proceed accordingly. We assure you that our office will do everything possible to ensure a smooth and timely payment process.

Thank you once again for your cooperation, and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shellie

subject: Dear Beneficiary (DEAD OR STILL ALIVE?) confirm this if?
body:
[image: image.png]



*OFFICE OF PRESIDENTIAL COMMITTEE ON UNCLAIMED PAYMENT*


*Address: 9C33+X2W, Rue 390,Abuja Republic of Nigeria.*


* DEAR BENEFICIARY,*


*WISHING YOU A HAPPY SUNDAY,*

*HOW ARE YOU TODAY ?, DON'T BE SURPRISED TO RECEIVED THIS MAIL TODAY BEING
A SUNDAY AS THIS IS DUE THE SHORTEST TIMEFRAME OF THREE DAYS ONLY GIVEN BY
GOVERNMENT TO CONCLUDE ALL PENDING TRANSACTIONS.*

*MEANWHILE, WE THE OFFICE OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE FEDERATION JUDICIAL
COMMITTEE ON UNCLAIMED FUND (SSJCG) HAVE ALREADY LAST WEEK THURSDAY
RECEIVED A SECULAR LETTER FROM THE PRESIDENCY TO CARRY OUT THE PAYMENT OF
YOUR $5.9MILLIONTO YOU AS COMPENSATION FOR THE DELAY HAVE WITNESSED FOR THE
PAST YEARS.*

HOWEVER, MY OFFICE HAVE ALREADY FORWARDED YOUR FILE TO THE FIRST BANK PLC
FUND TRANSFER LEGAL DEPARTMENT FOR THE PROCESSING FINAL TRANSFER OF YOUR
$5.9MILLION TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.

*MEANWHILE, THE CONTRARY PART OF THE NEW DEVELOPMENT IS THAT ONE (MR. JOHN
HARRY) OF INDIANA USA DID CAME TO OUR OFFICE TWO DAYS AGO BEING SATURDAY
LAST WEEK AND INFORMED US  THAT YOU ARE DEAD AND THAT YOUR FAMILIES HAS
ASKED HIM TO TAKE UP YOUR POSITION FOR YOUR FUND TO BE PAID TO HIM. *

*IF YOU ARE STILL ALIVE DO REPLY BACK IMMEDIATELY AND RE-CONFIRM TO MY
OFFICE US  THE BELOW DETAILED  INFORMATION OF YOURS.*


*  THE BELOW DATA INFORMATION OF YOURS  IS NEEDED:*

*FILL AND SEND THE BELOW TO MY OFFICE IMMEDIATELY:*
*----YOUR NAMES IN FULL AND GOING PHONE NUMBER*
*-----THE NAME OF YOUR COUNTRY OF ORIGIN*
*----YOUR OCCUPATION PRESENTLY*
*----YOUR AGE*
*-----YOUR MARITAL*




*Thanks from yours faithfully, *


*Chief Justice Dr. George Fabgemi *
*Judicial Committee Chairman*
* to Federal Government*
*on unclaimed Fund*

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary (DEAD OR STILL ALIVE?) confirm this if?
body:
Hello Chief Justice Dr. George Fabgemi,

I hope this message finds you well. I am indeed alive and well, thank you for your concern. It's quite surprising to hear about Mr. John Harry's claim, as I have no knowledge of him or any connection to Indiana, USA.

However, I'm curious about the process of this unclaimed fund transfer. Could you please explain more about it? How did my name come up in relation to these funds? And what is the role of the First Bank PLC Fund Transfer Legal Department in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cornelia
